page.title: 06MY LIFE AS A TEENAGER
page.content: My name is Karen Wrightson.I am 17 and attend a Technical College where I study secretarial work.I rise at 6.30 rush my breakfast of tea and toast. At 7.00 I go,in a friend's car to the village.I wait in a friend's house until the bus arrives at 8.20.a.m. Most evenings I watch television, listen to pop music,read romantic novels and help with domestic chores.I have no friends in the forest but I visit or invite them to my home.I go walking,attend church,occasionally go to discos,pop concerts,bus trips,fairs babysit and go shopping.I am learning to drive a car and am able to visit relations regularly.I usually go to bed at 10 p.m. The healthy environment and beautiful surroundings are what I like most about the forest but I need to seek excitement occasionally.
